params.name: exponential_decay_length_penalty
params.description: This tuple shall consist of: (start_index, decay_factor) where start_index indicates where penaltystarts and decay_factor represents the factor of exponential decay

params.name: eos_token_id
params.description: The id(s) of the end-of-sequence token.

params.name: input_ids_seq_length
params.description: The length of the input sequence.
